member.name: T:QuickSharp.Editor.ScintillaEditForm
member.summary: Provides the basic functionality for Scintilla-based text editors. As an abstract class this cannot be used directly; concrete editor classes must be defined to provide the actual editor user interface. See QuickSharp.TextEditor and QuickSharp.SqlEditor for examples.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.ScintillaEditForm.#ctor
member.summary: Create the editor.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.ScintillaEditForm.Reload
member.summary: Reload the file being edited (overriden in derived classes).

member.summary: Get the text being edited.

member.summary: Set the text to be edited.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.ScintillaEditForm.SetLocation(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the editing position.

member.summary: If true allow the file to be opened in multiple editors.
member.returns: True if multiple instances are allowed.

member.name: T:QuickSharp.Editor.Fonts
member.summary: Manage the representation of fonts.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.Fonts.GetFontList
member.summary: Get a list of installed fonts.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.Fonts.FontIsAvailable(System.String)
member.summary: Determine if a font is currently installed.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.Fonts.ValidateFontName(System.String)
member.summary: Get a valid font name. Returns the preferred font name if it is installed or the default (see Constants.DEFAULT_FONT_NAME).
member.param: The name of the preferred font
member.returns: The preferred font or the default if not available.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.Fonts.ValidateFontSize(System.Single)
member.summary: Get a valid font size. Returns the preferred font size if within acceptable limits or the default (10).
member.returns: The preferred size if within acceptable limits or the default.

member.name: T:QuickSharp.Editor.DocumentManager
member.summary: Maintains the association between registered document types and the corresponding Scintilla lexer. A language represents a specific document type recognised by the Scintilla editor and is mapped on to an internal Scintilla lexer. The language is represented by a configuration file with the same name as the language; each different configuration file maps to a lexer either directly or via an alias. A lexer may be referenced by multiple languages each with their own specific configuration. The lexer determines how the editor interprets the structure if the document, the language determines how the structure is presented (syntax coloring, fold points, etc.).

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.DocumentManager.GetInstance
member.summary: Get a reference to the DocumentManager singleton.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.DocumentManager.RegisterLexerAlias(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Register a lexer alias; adds the alias to the LexerAliasMap. Any existing mapping is overridden.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.DocumentManager.RegisterDocumentLanguage(QuickSharp.Core.DocumentType,System.String)
member.summary: Register a document language. A document type is associated with a language represented by a Scintilla lexer (or alias). The language encoding is UTF-8 by default.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.DocumentManager.RegisterDocumentLanguage(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Register a document language. A document type is associated with a language represented by a Scintilla lexer (or alias). The language encoding is UTF-8 by default.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.DocumentManager.RegisterDocumentLanguage(QuickSharp.Core.DocumentType,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Register a document language. A document type is associated with a language represented by a Scintilla lexer (or alias).
member.param: The default encoding for the document type.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.DocumentManager.RegisterDocumentLanguage(System.String,System.String,System.Text.Encoding)
member.summary: Register a document language. A document type is associated with a language represented by a Scintilla lexer (or alias).
member.param: The default encoding for the document type.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.DocumentManager.GetDocumentLanguage(QuickSharp.Core.DocumentType)
member.summary: Get the language registered for a document type.
member.returns: The registered language name or the default if not found.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.DocumentManager.GetDocumentEncoding(QuickSharp.Core.DocumentType)
member.summary: Get the encoding of a registered document type.
member.returns: The registered encoding or UTF-8 if not found.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.DocumentManager.GetNextUntitledFileBasename
member.summary: Get the base name for the next untitled document (e.g. 'untitled1').

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.DocumentManager.GetNextUntitledFileName(QuickSharp.Core.DocumentType)
member.summary: Get the full file name for the next untitled document (e.g. 'untitled1.txt').
member.param: The document type of the file.

member.name: M:QuickSharp.Editor.DocumentManager.DetectLineEnding(System.String)
member.summary: Determine the line ending type used by a text string.

member.name: P:QuickSharp.Editor.DocumentManager.LexerAliasMap
member.summary: A mapping of lexer aliases to actual Scintilla lexer names.
